channel.title: Please lock
channel.description:
[center][u][b][size=14pt]If you are reading this, then this Development Team has moved to the following new post:[/size][/b][/u]
[center][u][b][size=14pt]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,475462.0.html[/size][/b][/u]
[center][u][b][size=14pt]For any admin reading this, please lock this thread, as I will not be using it anymore. Thank you! :)[/size][/b][/u]

item.title: Please lock
item.dc:creator: @SunSpec221 SunSpec221
item.description:
@SunSpec221 wrote:

[quote=“flame255, post:29, topic:372199”]Preferable Position:In-Game Admin
E-Mail: Mt12094@hotmail.com (MSN)
Timezone: Eastern.
Years of experience with private servers of any game (and what game, too):Been with runescape private servers for almost 6 years now, and along side that with WoW private server’s.
How many hours a day (on average) can you dedicate to this private server?: Weekdays 3 hours minimum due to school ^^. and 5 hours max. Weekends all day basically. enless i have to work or help dad.
Are you able to code in Java?: Yep
Are you able to code in HTML?: Yep
Are you able to code in JavaScript?: nope
Other programming languages you know: C++, LUA, PHP.
Are you a creative person?: Creative. yes I am very open minded and when im in the RSPS bussiness I like to make event’s for players and release something new and great every week for them to keep interest.
Anything else that could be useful: I enjoy having fun and joke around but when it’s time to get searious i am, I know how to code mainly 317s because it is the easiest :P(for me)

Hope you enjoyed my app. add my MSN :)[/quote]

Read this:

[quote=“Project Realm, post:28, topic:372199”][center][size=12pt]UPDATE:[/size][/center]
I am [size=12pt]NO LONGER[/size] accepting applications. Because development won’t begin for about a week and a half, I believe it would be easier to resume applications after the new year. Therefore, for all those that have applied within the past few days (the ones I haven’t responded to), you can re-apply in January 2011.

My apologies, I just didn’t expect so many applications to come in in such a short amount of time.[/quote]

Read full topic

I am [size=12pt]NO LONGER[/size] accepting applications. Because development won’t begin for about a week and a half, I believe it would be easier to resume applications after the new year. item.title: Please lock
item.dc:creator: @poopoobear2 poopoobear2
item.description:
@poopoobear2 wrote:

Preferable Position: In-game mod/admin or advertiser
E-Mail: luke.coolboy@hotmail.co.uk this is also my msn
Timezone: Europe, Great Britain, London time
Years of experience with private servers of any game (and what game, too): ive had about a year or so on kingislepk as in game admin
How many hours a day (on average) can you dedicate to this private server? every day after school and on weekends alot
Are you able to code in Java? no
Are you able to code in HTML? no but if this means making websites then yes
Other programming languages you know: none
Are you a creative person? sort off
Anything else that could be useful: i like hotdogs with ketchup

Read full topic

item.title: Please lock
item.dc:creator: @Python1 Python_
item.description:
@Python1 wrote:

Preferable Position: Coder
E-Mail: drew1sgod@hotmail.com
Timezone: Err… United States?
Years of experience with private servers of any game (and what game, too): 3-years
How many hours a day (on average) can you dedicate to this private server?: As long as you need.
Are you able to code in Java?: Yeah, acceptable amounts.
Are you able to code in HTML?: Yup.
Other programming languages you know: Python (some), C++, Simba, CSS, PHP.
Are you a creative person?: Very much so.
Anything else that could be useful: I wrote 1 Framework #317 (Inception), and I’m currently coding my own server which is a Project Insanity Clean up, also known as RuneUnlimited. I can code your skills which is what I prefer to do. I coded 3 Delta’s before on my account “D.Ducky911” on the old R-Locus, and was a old veteran from R-Server. Anything you need, just ask. I do not work well with others, so if you would like me to code something I prefer you let me do it my way.

Read full topic

item.title: Please lock
item.dc:creator: @_Pandemonium `Pandemonium
item.description:
@_Pandemonium wrote:

[quote=“Sanity Maiden, post:15, topic:372199”]Preferable Position: In-Game Admin
E-Mail: teh-dagon-hai@hotmail.co.uk
Timezone: GMT London ?
Years of experience with private servers of any game (and what game, too): 4 Years / Runescape
How many hours a day (on average) can you dedicate to this private server? Week days around 6. Weekends like 12 :L
Are you able to code in Java? Yes
Are you able to code in HTML? Nope
Are you able to code in JavaScript? Yes
Other programming languages you know: Not too sure, CSS?
Are you a creative person? Yes i am very creative.
Anything else that could be useful: Well im really dedicated, i have had alot of experience in coding and being staff, although ive only ever coded 508 clients, 562 clients and 317 clients/servers.
I have a handy website design program called Serif Web plus i know alot about it just not too sure about web hosting. I also have Serif Draw plus which is a great program for making animated banners. I am good at advertising as i have a RSPS Msn with over 100 Rsps players on. Im not too sure if you want to know anything else, if you have any questions please pm me.

Skype : Callum.init.bruv[/quote]

How do you know JavaScript without knowing HTML…:fp:

Read full topic

item.title: Please lock
item.dc:creator: @Orangebob21 Orangebob21
item.description:
@Orangebob21 wrote:

[quote=“Project Realm, post:23, topic:372199”][quote author=Orangebob21 link=topic=468259.msg3436355#msg3436355 date=1292789228]
Preferable Position: In-Game Administrator, In-Game Moderator, Beta Tester
E-Mail: Orangebob21@live.com
Timezone: -8 GMT (Pacific Zone U.S. & Canada)
Years of experience with private servers of any game (and what game, too): 3-4 Years on RuneScape Private Servers and about 5 on RuneScape.
How many hours a day (on average) can you dedicate to this private server? 4-5 on weekdays and a lot more on weekends. It depends how busy I am.
Are you able to code in Java? Yeah.
Are you able to code in HTML? No.
Other programming languages you know: I don’t know any others.
Are you a creative person? Yes.
Anything else that could be useful: I am a very fast learner whenever I need to learn something and I have been staff many times on servers. I am also a very dedicated person.
[/quote]

Accepted! I will email you shortly with some info about what’s going on and when development will begin.[/quote]

Ok, thanks!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Sanity_Maiden Sanity Maiden
item.description:
@Sanity_Maiden wrote:

[quote=“Project Realm, post:18, topic:372199”][quote author=Sanity Maiden link=topic=468259.msg3434810#msg3434810 date=1292683300]
Preferable Position: In-Game Admin
E-Mail: teh-dagon-hai@hotmail.co.uk
Timezone: GMT London ?
Years of experience with private servers of any game (and what game, too): 4 Years / Runescape
How many hours a day (on average) can you dedicate to this private server? Week days around 6. Weekends like 12 :L
Are you able to code in Java? Yes
Are you able to code in HTML? Nope
Are you able to code in JavaScript? Yes
Other programming languages you know: Not too sure, CSS?
Are you a creative person? Yes i am very creative.
Anything else that could be useful: Well im really dedicated, i have had alot of experience in coding and being staff, although ive only ever coded 508 clients, 562 clients and 317 clients/servers.
I have a handy website design program called Serif Web plus i know alot about it just not too sure about web hosting. I also have Serif Draw plus which is a great program for making animated banners. I am good at advertising as i have a RSPS Msn with over 100 Rsps players on. Im not too sure if you want to know anything else, if you have any questions please pm me.

Skype : Callum.init.bruv
[/quote]

Accepted. As I told the rest of the dev. team, development won’t begin for a week or two. I’m still extremely busy, but I’m putting the finishing touches on a new website which will be up tonight.

TimmahPwnz: MoparScape is not letting me PM you, and because you prefer to use this form of communication rather than email, it’d be cool if you could unblock me.[/quote]

Ah, thanks alot, please add my Msn as sometimes i don’t realise when ive got a message on here.
Goodluck with the new website !

  • Callum

Read full topic

item.title: Please lock
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

[quote=“Jayco, post:6, topic:372199”]Preferable Position: Advertiser, In-Game Admin & Beta Tester
E-Mail: xkasperjohansen@live.dk
Timezone: GMT +1
Years of experience with private servers of any game (and what game, too): 6 years in all. 5 years with WoW, and 1 year with RS.
How many hours a day (on average) can you dedicate to this private server?: 5-6 hours aprox.
Are you able to code in Java?: Yes
Are you able to code in HTML?: Yes
Are you able to code in JavaScript?: No
Other programming languages you know: C++, LUA, PHP.
Are you a creative person?: I consider my self as a very creative person. I both rap and dance, so you need to creative to come up with new things every time.
Anything else that could be useful: I got a handle of all commands in-game, but it would be good if we could make a list of other commands we make ;)[/quote]

Accepted! Again, as I told the other development team members, real development won’t be beginning for a little while now because I am quite busy this month.

Also, because it seems as if you have quite some talent with several programming languages, it would be awesome if you could help code the server, along with myself and TimmahPwnz. It’s up to you, but you seem well qualified for the position.

Read full topic
